name: Getting the measurement systems right
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: If you can’t consistently measure it you can’t benchmark and mitigate it! This seminar will look at how to consistently measure embodied carbon on construction projects. It will look at a number of standards including the RICS Embodied Carbon guidance note, and Environmental Performance declarations.  Hear from experts who have pioneered the measuring and mitigation of embodied carbon from component to system and the building.
